name: Animalgamations
description:
Pioneer a zoo specializing in the genetic experimentation of hybridized (KILLER) animals - AKA the "Animalgamations". Remain cautious, however: the more you mutate your specimens, the greater their speed and aggression... 

Controls: WASD to move. E to open doors. Left-Click to HURT an animal (this will pacify them if they get angry and run at you!). Right-Click to select two animals, and then press F to FUSE them together (mutated animals means more money!).

Going up to the Shopkeeper will open up his store. I recommend starting by buying 1 or 2 Turkeys.

Fusions: Only certain animals can be FUSED together. 
Tarantula + Turkey. 
Elephant + Koala. 
Whale + Llama.
Porcupine + Rhino.
Taranturkey + Koalaphant. 
Porcuphrino + Whallama.

Aggression Chance:
Green = 5% chance to attack you every 10 seconds.
Yellow = 15%.
Red = 25%.

Shooting Passive Animals: If you shoot a passive animal, everyone else will have their own aggression increased by 5%! Make sure to only shoot animals when they are angry! (doing this will reset their aggression to the normal rate)

Made for the SA Game Jam 2021 by 3rd-year Vega Durban student Kenton Leslie-Smith. Category: 72-hour project. Time: 29 hours (over 3 days).
